PLAY.TITLE: A Midsummer Night's Dream

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: PHILOSTRATE, master of the revels to Theseus.
HIPPOLYTA, queen of the Amazons, betrothed to Theseus.
HERMIA, daughter to Egeus, in love with Lysander.
Other fairies attending their King and Queen.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Athens, and a wood near it.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Athens. The palace of THESEUS.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, and
Attendants
Enter EGEUS, HERMIA, LYSANDER, and DEMETRIUS
Exeunt all but LYSANDER and HERMIA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Athens. QUINCE'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT, and
STARVELING

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A wood near Athens.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter, from opposite sides, a Fairy, and PUCK

Enter, from one side, OBERON, with his train;
from the other, TITANIA, with hers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another part of the wood.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter OBERON and squeezes the flower on TITANIA's eyelids

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The wood. TITANIA lying asleep.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT, and
STARVELING
Re-enter PUCK, and BOTTOM with an ass's head
Exeunt QUINCE, SNUG, FLUTE, SNOUT, and STARVELING
Enter PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, and MUSTARDSEED

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another part of the wood.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exit LYSANDER, as following the voice

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PUCK
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Squeezing the juice on LYSANDER's eyes

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The same. LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HELENA, and HERMIA lying asleep.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter TITANIA and BOTTOM; PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH,
MUSTARDSEED, and other Fairies attending; OBERON
behind unseen
Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, EGEUS, and train

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THESEUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Horns and shout within. LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS,
HELENA, and HERMIA wake and start up

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, EGEUS, and train

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Athens. QUINCE'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter QUINCE, FLUTE, SNOUT, and STARVELING

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Athens. The palace of THESEUS.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, Lords and
Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: THESEUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HERMIA, and HELENA

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Pyramus and Thisbe, Wall, Moonshine, and Lion
Exeunt Prologue, Thisbe, Lion, and Moonshine
The Lion shakes Thisbe's mantle, and exit
Enter OBERON and TITANIA with their train
